title: If statements to print based on score - write code

content.prompt: Which of the following code segments will print the correct message for any valid value ofâ€‡score?

choices.label:
String message = "";
if (score < 250)
{
   message = "Try again.";
}
else if (score <= 500)
{
   message = "Good!";
}
else 
{
   message = "Great!";
}
System.out.println(message);
